lead_paragraph: This year’s Hall of Fame Game between the Chicago Cubs and San Diego Padres on June 16 will be the last in the exhibition series. Officials at the National Baseball Hall of Fame and Museum said Tuesday that Major League Baseball decided that keeping the game was too difficult because of the complexities of the major league schedule. The first Hall of Fame Game was played in 1940.
